root.name: Elminage Original
root.description: OverviewElminage Original is a turn-based first-person 6 character party dungeon crawler RPG created by Starfish for the PlayStation 2. It features 12 character races and 16 classes, and sets the player on a quest to recover the 6 "God Rings" that protect the world from demonic forces.It has been ported to the Nintendo DS and PlayStation Portable. The PSP port was released in North America on November 20th, 2012 by UFO Interactive, and is due out in Europe in 2013 from Ghostlight Ltd.
